issue.title: [Format] remove individual documents in favor of new document once all content is moved
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4511](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4511). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We might want to leave the documents in place and provide links to the new consolidated document in case others are linking to published content.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4511?focusedCommentId=16918106) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5202
